static gravatar_url ($email, $size=40, $default= 'http://www.emeraldion.it/assets/images/no-avatar.png')
 Returns the URL of the gravatar icon for an email address.

Detailed Description

Helper class for Gravatar user icons.

Gravatar (http://www.gravatar.com) is a popular provider for universally recognized avatars (i.e. user icons) used to distinguish users when they comment blog posts, join a forum etc.

Member Function Documentation

Gravatar::gravatar_url ( $  email,
$  size = 40,
$  default = 'http://www.emeraldion.it/assets/images/no-avatar.png' 
) [static]

Returns the URL of the gravatar icon for an email address.

Parameters:
email The email for the gravatar profile.
size A size (side of the square) for the gravatar icon.
default The default icon for users that do not have a registered gravatar icon.
